title: 【预告】葉京都 — 我是皇帝啦QWQ
author: 拉结尔之书

replies.author: 葉子の
replies.txt_content:
标题: 【预告】葉京都 — 我是皇帝啦QWQ 本帖最后由 葉子の 于 2017-4-9 21:17 编辑 

公元632年，長安凜音公主和洛陽琉璃公主，來到了葉城。   In 632 A.D.Changan Linyin princess and luoyang Liuli princess，Came to the Ye city.    由於葉城縣令葉子治理有方，向天子報導了這裡的繁榮景象。    As a result of the Ye city of the duke, let here have very good governance, report to the emperor, this scene of prosperity.    在兩位公主殿下的幫助下，天子賜予了葉子一座王府，俸祿6666萬石。    With the help of two of your highness, son of heaven gives the leaves a palace, 6666 mangoku salary.      現在讓我們來揭曉這座王府的廬山真面目吧。    Now let us known this palace looks like.    偶買噶！老天你到底讓我看到了什麼！我的眼睛！    Oh, my god! You make me see? My eyes!公元635年，實力日漸昌盛葉王起兵謀反，在葉安島稱帝。   Real powerful Ye king rebelled against the government, in Ye island announced that the emperor    並將長安凜音公主和洛陽琉璃公主掠走   Changan Linyin princess and luoyang Liuli princess dismantling    出现叛亂，混亂皇帝很生气,起兵攻打葉安岛   Rebellion, the emperor was very angry,fight against YeAn island   公元637年，混亂皇帝停止進攻。葉王反攻，天下被統一  In 637 AD, the chaos emperor stop attack. YeAn king counter-offensive, the world is unified.    公元642年，葉始皇遷都葉京都。公元643年發動擴張戰爭。    In 642 AD, emperor of the capital, Kyoto. In 643 AD, the start of the war in territorial expansion.根据剧情的情节设定，葉子镇[完成]→时光机→葉王都府[完成]→葉王岛[完成]→↙葉京都[建设中]→葉京城[设想]葉子镇—2016年万圣节前两周启动—2017年2月3日结束葉王都府—3月11日启动—3月25日结束葉王岛  —4月  7  日启动—4月 9 日结束葉京都—4月15日启动—暑假前结束[完成后发锭庆祝]葉京城—设想中···[完成后出国玩][现在放出葉京都的设计图]
是不是感觉很惊？QWQ我也是这样感觉的QWQ

replies.author: Java_command
replies.txt_content:
I am going to teach you about the acient chinese political system so that you can know you did not make any sense.
Let's talk about the palace first. A minister can not get a palace and can not become a king. ONLY the brothers of the emperor can become a king. So we have 3 types of things for the minister:
Gong / Hou / Bo
公，侯，伯
A Hou can rule a city.
A Gong can rule a province.
A Bo does not do anything.
The generals can become a Hou, if he is really good he can become a Gong.
But I think you are not a generals, so you can not become a Hou or a Gong.
You are a government official I suppose. So you can only become a Bo and you do not do anything.
This does not make sense that you got a palace!
During 635AD is the Tang Dynasty and the emperor was Tang Gao Gong Li Zhi, the empire was very powerful during that time... So this does not make any sense that you can even fight the empire... 
Oh I forgot about the two princess. The emperor has daughters that's true. He has four daughters:
YiYang princess
GaoAn princess
AnDingSi princess
TaiPing princess
It seems there was no a princess called LinYin of Liuli...
So this does not make any sense!
